Text: Vem har du tänkt ska tanka hem dinna program när du skriver... vet du inte vad det är så är det inget för dig..  det finns väll bara någon miljard olika program.. och man kan inte veta vad allt är.. .

One main reason why i don't add the description in each torrent is that i ,must open each nfo for each release, copy the relevant information, and paste it back, it takes time enough to download everything, set it all up and so on, i must spare some time somewhere.

As you probably noticed I do a follow up of my torrents, mainly if something is wrong with one so I can point that out, and yes, I try to answer as polite as possible, this doesn't take as much time as the other reason.

Yours Truly
TheTeaher
